name: Game & Watch Gallery 3
description:
With the third of the Game & Watch Gallery series, you can enjoy five different games in both their original and revised releases:

  • Egg - Catch your eggs before they hatch!
  • Turtle Bridge - Carry the packages across the turtles' backs!
  • Green House - Protect your plans from the pesky pests!
  • Mario Bros.™ - Help Mario™ and Luigi™ keep the factory flowing!
  • Donkey Kong Jr.™ - Grab the key, and free Donkey Kong™!
  • There are also six extra games that can be unlocked and played in Classic mode!

This game is only playable in 2D.

This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. See more Virtual Console games for Nintendo 3DS.
